Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photos show a man in Sri Lanka having an austere meal when in reality they show a security guard in Malaysia eating a meal.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on misinformation and lacks proper context.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that the photos depict the hardships experienced by common people in Sri Lanka, which is not supported by evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the photos actually show a security guard in Malaysia and not a man in Sri Lanka.
Understate: The claim understates the significance of the misinformation and lack of context in the original posts.
Exaggerate: There is no evidence of exaggeration in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not appear to falter at any point.
Other biases: The claim does not exhibit any other biases.
